reviews.review: GET IT NOWWWWWWWW

Killing floor não é um jogo muito complexo, mas posso dizer que é muito divertido! Imagine um L4D, só que com muitos, muitos mais zumbis e com os especiais aparecendo mais vezes. Killing Floor tem ambientes sombrios e macabros, você ganha dinheiro (matando os mutantes) para comprar armas na Trader, tem classes e cada uma delas tem armas especiais. O jogo é de ondas que quanto mais tempo você sobrevive, mais dificil fica. Na última onda tem uma surpresa... não muito agradável. Jogue e descubra!

One of the best zombie games ever! Endless amounts of fun!

Fajny Co-Op, mutanty, strzały w głowę (szczególnie w zwolnionym tempie). Lecz nie podoba mi się, że co rundę trzeba biegnąć do handlarza, mogło to być zrobione, że kiedy ktoś musi to może iść po broń. Można by wtedy samodzielne zwiedzanie okolicy, a nie dążenie ciągle w jednym kierunku. Ale polecam i oceniam na 8+/10.

8/10 Strange yet awesome zombie game. The whole game is based off of waves, each wave sends different zombies at you, these zombies do different things some are harder than others. You earn cash for every zombie kill and you can buy weapons depending on the class you are. All of the classes are awesome and when you earn xp on one server it transfers to another so you can move from one difficulty to another very easily. Great game to play with your mates, a bit more serious than left 4 dead and can be a lot harder. 100% recommended, it’s a full game yet so cheap, recommend buying the DLC for it as well considering its quality and how cheap it is.

I sold my soul for Killing Floor.
It's really only fun with friends, which is what they were aiming for I guess.

The 10 Commandments of Killing Floor:

1) I am your team medic, thou shall not have other medics besides me.

2) Thou shall not piss me off for I am your only medic.

3) Thou shall not weld every door thou sees.

4) Thou shall always headshot the bloat and not blow it up with teamates nearby.

5) Thou shall not covet thy teamates gun.

6) Thou shall not bring a knife/machete/axe/sword/chainsaw to a Siren fight.

7) Thou shall not get grabbed by a clot.

8) Thou shall not steal the firebug's kills.

9) Thou shall be mindeful of friendly fire.

10) Thou shall not beg thy teamates for cash.

For those who liked Horde mode in Gears of War, Nazi Zombies in Call of Duty, and Counter Strike games, this one is for you. Let me add that, if that is ALL that you enjoyed playing on the first two, then you will enjoy this. But if you liked doing something other than mindlessly facing against 10 waves of experiments and creatures trying to dismember you, then you might want to bring some friends. This game is heavily dependant upon how much you enjoy cooperating with your team (unless you're a bad@$$ that can run around during a zombie apocalypse and avoid the nasties and still remain at the top of the kill board). Fun game, but can get stale without friends.

I try my best  to avoid first person shooters at all cost, I think there boring and very repetitive, doesn't hold much to the imagination of humans being to say "Let's make a game where you shoot a gun" but we can do that in real life so I don't understand what the huge fascination is about them. That is unless someone makes it so you can shoot something not real, or the weapon you have is just crazy, that is why I recommend Killing Floor.

This first person shooter horror survival is very enjoyable, play solo or with your friends there is plenty to look forward to and a number of weapons to try out, and not to mention if you think the game is too easy you can increase the difficulty, and trust me you will lose many times if you don't know what you're doing.

The game feel is frightening by yourself,  and you get a sense of what it would be like if a huge wave of monsters was coming for you, and even with friends the tension you feel is still there, just make sure you have a good team unless your all done for.

There are a good number of maps and monster to empty your clips on, ranging from downtown London to a hillbilly bayou, you'll have plenty to keep you busy. And if that's not enough for you, there are 7 perks you can level up to make yourself and your team even stronger. At the beginning I thought to myself "I'll level these guys up in no time at all" how wrong I was, level each perk will take a long time to reach the highest rank of perk. I grained the medic class only for 3 months and I achieved highest rank. and that the easy one! Aside from medic, there is Sharpshooter, firebug, demo, berserker, support and commando with their own unique weapons to use and own unique abilities to help you out.

This game its worth buying and I highly recommend it, hours of fun and you'll defiantly not complete it within a week. Thank you for reading!

개인적으로 돈이 아깝지 않을 정도로 재밌습니다.

FPS, 호러, 웨이브, 디펜스, 생존, 코옵 게임이라고 볼 수 있겠습니다.

최종적으로 보스인 패트리아크까지 잡고 생존하는 것이 목적입니다.

- 다양한 퍼크(클래스)가 존재합니다.
- 퍼크 레벨이 높아짐에 따라 해당 퍼크의 능력이 강화됩니다. (무기 가격 다운, 스폰 시 무기 제공 등)
- 크로스 헤어(조준점)이 없으며 마우스 우클릭을 통한 정조준이 존재합니다.

! 만렙에서의 자멸, 헬 난이도도 재밌지만, 개인적으로 퍼크 특성이 제대로 나타나기 시작하는 3, 4 성쯤이 가장 재밌었습니다.

Amazing game! Continuous waves of enemies spawn with trader time inbetween, to stock up on ammo and buy new guns. As the game progresses the waves get more challenging, until the final wave which is the boss battle. 
This game is fun to play with friends and other people online. There are tons of maps to play on, player made and from the main game. There are 7 different classes so there is a class for everyone's enjoyment. Leveling perks gives bonuses for that specific perk and gets better each level. The free Events are a bonus!

Amazing game! It has limited customization of characters but the reward of winning is enough! Each map is large and easy to get lost in, and enables friends to tactically take down the enemy or fall that much quicker. Perks allow you to show what you specialize in, and the new ability to use the workshop allows you to add a personal touch or create a better experience, which is difficult due to its amazingly executed server-based, arena horror game!
Let's shoot zombies! The enemy selection ranges from mildly annoying to near impossible without friends in the game. Great game - and use teamwork on the harder settings!

This is probably the best FPS Co-op game I have ever played. In it you level up your classes/perks to level 6 for the best advantages. You can be a Berserker, Commando, Medic, Sharpshooter, Balistics, Fire user, or Support class/perk(Not al exact names). All the perks can use any weapon that the character can afford and has unlocked or bought as a DLC. For example, the Berserker gets bonuses with melea weapons, but can use an ak-47 if he/she wants to. You can also pick different character skins to give your character some customization. In this game you either play solo or with other people online in a map that the group chooses. You must survive each wave against different types of creatures. At the end there is a powerful boss. You get to choose different difficulties, plenty of customization and different things to try out. I recommend you buy this game if you like co-op shooters. It's a lot of fun.

Based on a Unreal tournament mod, Killing Floor is an amazing coop zombie killing game that bring a lot to the table other games have not. Not only does the game have a very addicted and fun gameplay. But the classes in the game that you can level increase the amount of hours you can pour into the game. 

How it works:
Killing floor works in such a way that you will have a team of different classes. All classes fills a purpose and a good team setup is needed to counter certain difficulties and maps. A base setup on higher difficulties are 1 medic(for obvious reasons), 1 berserker(that can tank damage and stay on the frontline), 1-2 support specialists(To wield doors fast and use shotguns piercing to kill several enemies, 1 sharpshooter(to take care of the tough enemies) and the other classes can be added depending on what the team need.

When the team have a good setup they will later face waves of enemies. These waves will continuesly grow stronger and after the last level you will face a boss. Remember that no class are effective against all enemies and will struggle when facing several 'wrong' enemies at once. The difficulty dictates how hard the enemies you face are. Having an increased difficulty does not only make the enemies harder to kill but also faster and they deal more damage. 

What makes this different from any other zombie game:

Its a very free and open game that lets the players decide how they are going to counter waves. The team can be roaming or defensive. But the core gameplay in the game is often to barricade and defend(as roaming usually results in you getting ambushed). Because of the classes there are a huge variety in players as they all specialize in different things. There also exist a huge amount of weapons that each class can use, and certain weapons grant different subplaystyles for classes.

Overall its a great game and one of(if not) the best LAN games you can play.
The only bad thing with this game is that the network coding can be a trouble sometimes when healing allies. 
9/10

Killing Floor to modyfikacja Unreal Tournament 2004.Która działa na silniku Unreal Engine 2.5.Akcja gry osadzona jest w Wielkiej Brytanii gdzie w skutek niudanego eksperymentu z klonowaniem ludzi ludzie zaczeli zamieniać się w mutanty.W grze wcielamy się w żołnierzy i antyterrorystów,którzy walczą o przetrwanie.Do gry zostało wydane dużo dlc w którym są dodatkowe bronie i postacie.Postacie są ciekawymi gośćmi różnych stylów np steampunkowców :P oraz również mrocznych gości,
specjalnych wojsk i dobrze uzbrojonych przetrwańców.Uzbrojenia w grze jest nawet sporo od broni białej aż do granatników i innych gadżetów które urozmaicają rozgrywkę i robią niezłą rzeź.Są nawet eventy w których mutanty zamieniają się w zombie lub elfów i innych dziwadeł, można dostać specjalne osiągniecia eventowe np: za zabicie św. Mikołaja i udostępniane są nowe mapki.Też jest levelowanie postaci ale w danej dziedzinie np: medyk polowy,komandos,gość od demolki itp. Można wybrać tylko jedną dziedzinę podczas wybierania gry,levelujemy za wymagania gdzie musimy np: zabić kilkadziesiąt ofiar pistoletem,bronią białą lub granatnikiem, do wyboru do koloru :>.Grę oceniam na 8+/10 za rzeź,dużo broni, postacie którymi gramy i eventy.Minusem jest brzydka grafika i drogie dlc ale jak zawsze na steamie przeceny :3

Fun survival-type FPS with emphasis on working together to keep each other alive and well-equipped, but it's still possible to do some hero runs if suddenly everyone else is dead. There are cool enemies with neat abilities that must be considered carefully; gauging what a particular horde constitution can do to you makes team work and quick decision-making a priority.

This game has a lot more to it than the poorly done trailer shows. It doesn't take much time to learn to play it, but you can always tell an experienced player from a rookie, because it actually takes some skill and creativity, plus it has a variety of difficulties to suit any player, from casual gamer to hardcore FPS fan. Can be fun both with full team of friends and with only one friend, or even solo - and yes, even the hardest difficulty is doable solo, so don't be discouraged if you don't have 5 friends to play with and don't want to play with random people.
